metadata.title: CVE-2015-8078 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the index_urlfetch function in imap/index.c in Cyrus IMAP 2.3.19, 2.4.18, and 2.5.6 allows remote attackers to have unspecified impact via vectors related to urlfetch range checks and the section_offset variable.  NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2015-8076.

criterions.comment: cyrus-imapd package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.8-1').
